events.name: WOWZAPP 2012: Worldwide Hackathon for Windows -- Medellin, Colombia
events.about:
Be part of the app revolution!

By registering, you’ll be joining thousands of developers worldwide as we build apps for the next generation of Windows.

Expert Help, Free Resources

Microsoft app experts, developers and trainers will be available on-site to assist your learning and coding. Learn about building Windows Store apps today – download the info, tools and resources you need now. 

Windows Azure Mobile Services

Does your Store app idea include cloud services or storage? Check out Get started withMobile Services –registered student WOWZAPP 2012 participants are eligible for a FREE student Windows Azure six-month subscription!– supplies are limited so be sure to register now!

So, get ready now! 
ONE –      Register!
TWO –     Get the Tools!
THREE –  Get Prepared through an online course http://bit.ly/MVA-W8
FOUR –    Think about your app! What is great at? More info HERE

If you successfully complete the Online course and create the best app, you could win Microsoft Certification Training. More details will be announced soon!
